description: A mass located in the mediastinum, which is the area between the lungs that contains the heart, great vessels, and other structures.

attributes.name: Presence of Mediastinal Mass
attributes.description: Indicates whether a mediastinal mass is present or not.

values.name: Yes
values.description: A mediastinal mass is present.

values.name: No
values.description: No mediastinal mass is present.

attributes.name: Anatomical Location
attributes.description: The anatomical location of the mediastinal mass.

values.name: Anterior Mediastinum
values.description: The mass is located in the anterior mediastinum, which is in front of the heart and behind the sternum.

values.name: Middle Mediastinum
values.description: The mass is located in the middle mediastinum, which contains the heart and pericardium.

values.name: Posterior Mediastinum
values.description: The mass is located in the posterior mediastinum, which is behind the heart and in front of the spine.

attributes.name: Size
attributes.description: The size of the mediastinal mass.

values.name: Small
values.description: The mass is small in size.

values.name: Medium
values.description: The mass is medium in size.

values.name: Large
values.description: The mass is large in size.

attributes.name: Density
attributes.description: The density of the mediastinal mass.

values.name: Solid
values.description: The mass has a solid consistency.

values.name: Cystic
values.description: The mass has a cystic consistency, containing fluid or air-filled spaces.

values.name: Mixed
values.description: The mass has a mixture of solid and cystic components.

attributes.name: Borders
attributes.description: The borders of the mediastinal mass.

values.name: Well-defined
values.description: The borders of the mass are well-defined.

values.name: Poorly defined
values.description: The borders of the mass are poorly defined.

attributes.name: Effects on Surrounding Structures
attributes.description: The effects of the mediastinal mass on the surrounding structures.

values.name: Compression
values.description: The mass is compressing the surrounding structures.

values.name: Displacement
values.description: The mass is displacing the surrounding structures.

values.name: None
values.description: The mass is not causing any effects on the surrounding structures.

attributes.name: Lymphadenopathy
attributes.description: Indicates whether lymphadenopathy, or enlarged lymph nodes, is present or not.

values.name: Present
values.description: Lymphadenopathy is present.

values.name: Absent
values.description: No lymphadenopathy is present.

attributes.name: Calcifications
attributes.description: Indicates whether calcifications are present or not.

values.name: Present
values.description: Calcifications are present.

values.name: Absent
values.description: No calcifications are present.

attributes.name: Signs of Invasion
attributes.description: Indicates whether signs of invasion, such as infiltration into surrounding tissue, are present or not.

values.name: Present
values.description: Signs of invasion are present.

values.name: Absent
values.description: No signs of invasion are present.
